Package com.soa.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDomain
    Domain represents a set of user that managed by a specific user store.
    ISubjectCategory
    This interface represents a specific subject category when the security context involves multiple users.
    IUserPrincipal
    This is a principle class representing a user
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExternalDomain
    ExternalDomain is the domain that not directly manages by PolicyManager
    LocalDomain
    LocalDomain is the domain that directly managed by PolicyManager.
    SubjectCategory
    This is the default implementation of the ISubjectCategory
    UserPrincipal
    This is the default implementation of IUserPrincipal
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthenticationException  
    AuthorizationException
